keyMappings:
# マッピング初期化
unmapAll

#スクロール
map i scrollUp
map k scrollDown
map I scrollFullPageUp
map K scrollFullPageDown
#map <m-i> scrollFullPageUp
#map <m-k> scrollFullPageDown
map <m-I> scrollToTop
map <m-K> scrollToBottom

#画面内操作
map r reload
map u copyCurrentUrl
map o openCopiedUrlInNewTab

#vimiumモード
map v LinkHints.activateMode
map V LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <m-v> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

#vomnibar
map f Vomnibar.activate
map F Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

#画面内検索
#map / enterFindMode
#map <c-;> performFind
#map <c-+> performBackwardsFind

#ページ戻る/進む
map j goBack
map l goForward

#タブ操作
map t createTab
map T restoreTab
map d duplicateTab
map z visitPreviousTab
map w removeTab

map J previousTab
map L nextTab
#map <m-j> previousTab
#map <m-l> nextTab
map <m-j> moveTabLeft
map <m-l> moveTabRight

#Help
map ? showHelp
searchEngines:
# w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
a: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
